New Records: Lionel Messi broke the record for most minutes played in Copa América history
Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez scored for Argentina in the 35th minute
Kevin Rodríguez equalized for Ecuador in the 90'+1'
Emiliano Martínez made two crucial saves in the penalty shootout
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni expressed that winning via penalties is not enjoyable but acknowledged the importance of the goalkeeper's performance
Felix Sanchez commented on Enner Valencia's missed penalty and acknowledged Messi's overall contribution
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match went to penalties after a 1-1 draw in regulation time
Argentina dominated possession early on but Ecuador created the first chance
